Client side application.
========================

This application used outside the chat page. There are several functions are provide follows functions.

1. Show online indicator.
2. Show web cam indicator.
3. Generate invitation link to chat page.
4. Show pop up windows that inform user about invitations or new messages.

   

.. autoanysrc:: directives
    :src: ../../www/js/app/tpapp.js 
    :analyzer: js
